abstract: Brian Schreiber, who became chief strategy officer last year, and Seraina Maag, who led the company’s regional management operations, will leave.
snippet: Brian Schreiber, who became chief strategy officer last year, and Seraina Maag, who led the company’s regional management operations, will leave.
lead_paragraph: After joining the American International Group nearly two decades ago, Brian Schreiber became a major executive in building the insurance giant up — and then, after the financial crisis, in helping it shrink.

headline.main: 2 More Top Executives to Step Down at A.I.G.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
